channel.title: help on Walmo SDLC Test
channel.description: Recent content in help on Walmo SDLC Test

item.title: Markdown Notes
item.description: Tables You can create tables by assembling a list of words and dividing them with hyphens - (for the first row), and then separating each column with a pipe |: so this First Header | Second Header ------------ | ------------- Content from cell 1 | Content from cell 2 Content in the first column | Content in the second column Renders as this First Header Second Header Content from cell 1 Content from cell 2 Content in the first column Content in the second column shopping list pt 1 allen wrenches gerbil feeders toilet seats electric heaters Trash compactors juice extractor shower rods and water meters shopping list pt 2 Walkie-talkies copper wires safety goggles radial tires shopping list pt 3 BB pellets rubber mallets fans and dehumidifiers shopping list pt 4 Picture hangers paper cutters waffle irons

item.title: Content Info
item.description: Basic help about site Our basic taxonomy comes from the Metadata in our ‘Front Matter’ This page has the following ‘Front Matter’ taxonomy. tags: ["content" , "help" , "taxonomy"] catagories: ["help"] components: ["hugo"] authors: ["walmo"] Our types of taxonomy we are using are based on our configuration file. The contents [“content” , “help” , “taxonomy”] we add when we create our file. More accurate content in our Metadata will help users navigate the documents contained within the site.
